meta.name: description
meta.content: The Allegany County NY Sheriff’s Office website was developed to help improve communication with area residents. The Allegany County NY Sheriff’s website allows residents to connect with the Allegany County NY Sheriff’s Office by reporting crimes, submitting tips, and other interactive features, as well as providing the community with the latest public safety news and information. The website is another public outreach effort developed by the Allegany County NY Sheriff’s Office to improve communication with county residents and visitors. This website is not intended to be used to report emergency situations. Please call 911 in an emergency.
